title: Teenage sprinter Himasha Eshan banned for one year
content: Professor Arjuna de Silva spelling out the ban on Himasha Eshan. Also in the picture is Panduka Keerthinanda, one of the members of the committee appointed to inquire into the country’s only positive dope case so far this year.  (Pic by Jude Denzil Pathiraja) The three-member committee, which was appointed to inquire into the country’s…
